H0.text: Stems make seeds is the plant part described correctly.

H1.text: Roots absorb nutrients is the plant part described correctly.

H2.text: Leaves absorb water is the plant part described correctly.

H3.text: Flowers are the plant parts that make food, correctly described in the question.

A4.text: Root epidermal cells and root hairs take up soil water and dissolved ions; these are then conducted to the shoot via the xylem.
